ruleFindList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
tmp=java.ajax("http://api.zhuishushenqi.com/ranking/gender");
tmp=JSON.parse(tmp);
cate=java.ajax("http://api.zhuishushenqi.com/cats/lv2");
cate=JSON.parse(cate);
result="";
function f(a,b) {
	var x="";y=tmp[a];
	for (i in y) 
{x+=b+y[i].shortTitle+"::/ranking/"+y[i]._id+"&&";}
	result +=x;
	};
function ff(a,b) {
	var x="";y=cate[a];u1="::/book/by-categories?gender=";u2="&type=hot&start={{(searchPage-1)*50}}&limit=50&&"
	for (i in y) {
x+=b+y[i].major+u1+a+"&major="+y[i].major+u2;
		for (j in y[i].mins) {x+=b+y[i].major+"/"+y[i].mins[j]+u1+a+"&major="+y[i].major+"&minor="+y[i].mins[j]+u2;}
	};result +=x;
	};
f("male","[男]");f("female","[女]");f("epub","[出版]");
ff("male","[男]");ff("female","[女]");ff("press","[出版]");
String(result);
</js>

.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')

ruleFindList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleBookContent:
content = { childNode: [], // 子节点数组 childNodes: result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/) ? java.getElements("#"+result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/)[1]+"@p").toArray() : "", // 根据匹配到的nrid获取子节点数组 UpWz: function(m, i) { // 定义UpWz函数，根据传入的参数进行计算返回值 var k = Math.ceil((i + 1) % this.code); // 对(i+1)与code取模并向上取整 k = Math.ceil(m - k); // 对m减去k并向上取整 return k; }, load: function() { // 加载函数 this.code = String(result).match(/codeurl="(\d+)"/)[1]; // 获取code值 var e = String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('[name=client]@content'))).split(/[A-Z]+%/); // 对字符串进行base64解码并按一定分隔符分割成数组 for (var i = 0; i < e.length; i++) { // 遍历数组 var k = this.UpWz(e[i], i); // 调用UpWz函数计算出k值 this.childNode[k] = this.childNodes[i]; // 将计算后的值作为索引，将对应的子节点存入childNode数组 } } } if(baseUrl.match(/verify/)){ result = "如果没获取到目录，说明验证码不对，详情页刷新重新获取验证码"; } else { if(baseUrl.match(/\d+_2\.html/)){ content.load(); result = content.childNode.join("
"); } else if(baseUrl.match(/\/\d+\.html/)){ result = java.getElements("#articlecontent@p"); } else { // 加载外部JS文件 cryptojs_min.js eval(String(java.ajax("http://danmeirouwen.net/17mb/js/jquery-1.9.1.min.js"))); // 定义函数d(a, b)用于解密操作 function d(a, b) { // 将b进行MD5加密并转换为字符串 b = CryptoJS.MD5(b).toString(); // 提取加密后字符串的前16位和后面部分作为iv和参数创建对象 var d = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(0, 16)); var e = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(16)); // 使用AES解密算法对a进行解密，并将结果转换为字符串格式 return CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(a, e, { iv: d, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8); } // 使用正则表达式匹配出来的信息作为参数调用函数d，并将结果赋值给result变量 result = eval(result.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\)/)[1]); } }

.replace(/shen/gi,'呻')
.replace(/she(头)/gi,'舌$1')
.replace(/she/gi,'射')
.replace(/(呻)yin/gi,'$1吟')
.replace(/yin(道|户|蒂)/gi,'阴$1')
.replace(/yin/gi,'淫')
.replace(/xing/gi,'性')
.replace(/bi/gi,'逼')
.replace(/cao/gi,'操')
.replace(/lun/gi,'伦')
.replace(/giang/gi,'肛')
.replace(/gian/gi,'干')
.replace(/luan/gi,'乱')
.replace(/jian/gi,'奸')
.replace(/ju/gi,'菊')
.replace(/chao/gi,'潮')
.replace(/dong/gi,'洞')
.replace(/rou/gi,'肉')
.replace(/ru/gi,'乳')
.replace(/xue/gi,'穴')
.replace(/bang/gi,'棒')
.replace(/jing/gi,'精')
.replace(/pi/gi,'屁')
.replace(/tun/gi,'臀')
.replace(/dang/gi,'荡')

href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom");
laiyuan='当前来源【'+xu+'】';
result='（下面 [换源列表] 若有多个项时，点详情页右上角 -> [设置书籍变量]，输入序号，[确定] 后再点 [刷新]，可更改对应的源，默认为0）【换源列表】：\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n————————————\n'+intro
</js>

<js>

var ys = String(page).match(/\d+/);
var list = [{text:'第1页',href:baseUrl}];
if(ys>=2){
for(var i=2;i<=ys;i++){
var url = baseUrl.replace(/.html/,'')
var html = url+'_'+i+'.html';
list.push({text:'第'+i+'页',href:html});
}}
list;
</js>
